attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent of a foreign born child and as one who is seeking a second
foreign adoption, the mere thought that the U.S. Government would need to raise
their fees 66% to process paperwork is absolutely appalling.

While I realize that the proposed increase is to handle all foreign processing
of applications maybe you should consider changing the policy as it relates to
adoptions.

The fees for adoption are already very high. Adding an increase of 66% will
make it nearly impossible for ordinary U.S. citizens to create a family through
adoption which for some like us may be their only opportunity to have a family.

Please reconsider this increase or at least consider separating the paperwork
for foreign adoptions from the general mass of applications from foreign
citizens coming to our country.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Maria Richardson
